abyss_battalion.effect_text: when played: the game turn after this, running the blockade costs you 2 orders.
abyss_battalion.name: abyss_battalion

all_hands_on_deck.effect_text: Pick any number of cards from your hand to put face down. Your opponent does the same. Reveal cards. If you have more printed firepower amongst your cards than your opponent, you may free play all of them. If you don't, your cards are destroyed. Opponent's cards are returned to hand.
all_hands_on_deck.name: all_hands_on_deck

anchross_aweigh.effect_text: while at sea the pirates on the ship opposite this one are all brought back to their base firepower (+x count as +0 in this case).
anchross_aweigh.name: anchross_aweigh

anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades.effect_text: while at sea at the start of your turn, you may choose to give up your free draw in exchange for an extra order.
anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades.name: anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades

angler_bot_of_the_chaos_urchin_order.effect_text: when played search your opponent’s poop deck and remove all copies of one of their cards from the game. they do the same with your poop deck.
angler_bot_of_the_chaos_urchin_order.name: angler_bot_of_the_chaos_urchin_order

apoc_ko1_lypse.effect_text: boarding restriction: your opponent gets a bonus order on their following turn.
apoc_ko1_lypse.name: apoc_ko1_lypse

arg_angel.effect_text: while at sea any of your opponent's pirates without shipmates count as +0 firepower
arg_angel.name: arg_angel

avast_avenger.effect_text: When a Crew is Completed, friendly or not, you may Free Play this card.
avast_avenger.name: avast_avenger

avian_airship.effect_text: this ship cannot be destroyed by a volley.
avian_airship.name: avian_airship

ba_ba_buccaneer.effect_text: when played you may either search your poop deck for a “sword” pirate and bring it to your hand or give one friendly pirate who is not a “sword” +3.
ba_ba_buccaneer.name: ba_ba_buccaneer

barfrogamew_hops.effect_text: while at sea any time you discard a card from your hand, you may free play one first before discarding down.
barfrogamew_hops.name: barfrogamew_hops

bionic_blowfish_blader.effect_text: when played you may choose to destroy another friendly pirate at sea. if you do, this pirate gains a permanent +6.
bionic_blowfish_blader.name: bionic_blowfish_blader

bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane.effect_text: when played you may either bring an “equip to” shanty from your poop deck to your hand or you may free play one from your hand.
bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane.name: bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane

boatload_buster.effect_text: every time a heavy metal (grey) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.
boatload_buster.name: boatload_buster

bootstrap_berserker.effect_text: while at sea when this card has a hidden shanty or “equip” card attached to it, it gets x2.
bootstrap_berserker.name: bootstrap_berserker

briney_deep_prehistoric_privateer.effect_text: while at sea, at the start of each turn if the ship this pirate is on has the most firepower of any ship at sea (friendly or not), gain a bonus order.
briney_deep_prehistoric_privateer.name: briney_deep_prehistoric_privateer

bring_me_that_horizon.effect_text: play the top card in either player' davy jones’ locker.
bring_me_that_horizon.name: bring_me_that_horizon

broadsidosaurus.effect_text: When played if this is the card to complete a crew, instead of firing the cannons, you immediately get a free search for the treasure. Before firepower is calculated, sink this ship.
broadsidosaurus.name: broadsidosaurus

bumble_smee.effect_text: when destroyed for every pirate on this pirate's ship you may destroy a pirate friendly or not.
bumble_smee.name: bumble_smee

calculegend.effect_text: boarding restriction: you may only board this pirate on a ship if the cumulative points on that ship will be a prime number (once played).
calculegend.name: calculegend

cannon_boo.effect_text:
surprise you may free play this card when your opponent is sending a volley. prevent a ship from sinking. if played this way, this card is a +4.

*only 3 surprise cards allowed per poop deck.
cannon_boo.name: cannon_boo

cannon_bully.effect_text:
surprise can free play, even on your opponent’s turn (as long as its ship is not empty). is destroyed at the  end of the player turn.

*only 3 surprise cards allowed per poop deck.
cannon_bully.name: cannon_bully

cannon_floof.effect_text: when played take the top card of your poop deck and immediately free play it (you cannot play another pirate via card effect for the rest of the player turn).
cannon_floof.name: cannon_floof

cannonball_cruiser.effect_text:
all boom (red) pirates on this ship get +5.

send a volley: when fourth pirate boards this ship, immediately send a volley without costing an order.
cannonball_cruiser.name: cannonball_cruiser

captain_lazerbeard.effect_text: while at sea this card’s firepower is multiplied by the number of heavy metal pirates in both player’s davy jones’ lockers. when destroyed, remove from the game.
captain_lazerbeard.name: captain_lazerbeard

caskmaster.effect_text: you may play this card as if it was a hidden shanty. upon revealing it, immediately board it on a friendly ship with space (any card that targets this card to destroy a shanty, is ignored and returned to the owner’s hand as if an order had not been spent).
caskmaster.name: caskmaster

coast_cutter.effect_text: all deep sea (blue) pirates on this ship get +5.
coast_cutter.name: coast_cutter

coco_cannon.effect_text: all tropical (orange) pirates on this ship get +5.
coco_cannon.name: coco_cannon

coconaut.effect_text: when played (with an order), search your poop deck for another “coconaut” card. it may immediately board this ship without costing an order (space allowing).
coconaut.name: coconaut

confused_crews.effect_text: both players select one friendly pirate if able and their opponent draws at random from their poop deck until a pirate is revealed. swap the new pirate with the selected one in each case. resolve boarding effects and shuffle poop decks.
confused_crews.name: confused_crews

crows_nest_coffee.effect_text: equip to a pirate that pirate gets +4. when this card is destroyed you may free play a card from your hand or draw a card.
crows_nest_coffee.name: crows_nest_coffee

crustacean_carrier.effect_text: once per turn, when a pirate without any effect boards this ship, you may destroy any one pirate (friendly or not).
crustacean_carrier.name: crustacean_carrier

cutlass_cricket.effect_text: while at sea all pirates that share a ship with this card get +5.
cutlass_cricket.name: cutlass_cricket

cycloptus.effect_text: while at sea any pirate that shares a ship with this card is destroyed.
cycloptus.name: cycloptus

dagger_of_the_deep.effect_text: discard two cards. Then, equip to a pirate (friendly or not). this pirate’s firepower is now inverted.
dagger_of_the_deep.name: dagger_of_the_deep

davy_jones_abomination.effect_text: while in davy jones' locker, you may spend two orders and remove this card from the game. destroy one pirate on each of your opponent's ships.
davy_jones_abomination.name: davy_jones_abomination

deal_with_the_broadside_devil.effect_text: equip to a ship. while at sea, when a player is sending a volley their ship needs more firepower aboard than the ship that is being sunk. otherwise the ship is not sunk.
deal_with_the_broadside_devil.name: deal_with_the_broadside_devil

deckstroyer_mk_iii.effect_text: all heavy metal (grey) pirates on this ship get +5.
deckstroyer_mk_iii.name: deckstroyer_mk_iii

disrupting_fundamental_laws_of_cannonbal.effect_text:
surprise you may free play this card when your opponent is sending a volley. destroy two friendly pirates. your ship is not destroyed, instead send a volley at one of your opponent’s ships. 

*only 3 surprise cards allowed per poop deck.
disrupting_fundamental_laws_of_cannonbal.name: disrupting_fundamental_laws_of_cannonball_physics

doctor_croctor.effect_text: when played return one card from your davy jones’ locker to your hand.
doctor_croctor.name: doctor_croctor

doombeard.effect_text: This card can only be played on “The Doomtreader” with “Remnants of Piracy’s First Age” equipped. While this card is at Sea, your opponent cannot successfully Run the Blockade. When you successfully  Run the Blockade you immediately win the game. Only one “Doombeard” allowed in a deck.
doombeard.name: doombeard

doombeards_cutlass.effect_text: cannot be played as a hidden shanty. equip to a pirate. if this pirate has the highest bounty at sea, it gets +10 and x2
doombeards_cutlass.name: doombeards_cutlass

feather_flotilla.effect_text: every time a tropical (orange) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.
feather_flotilla.name: feather_flotilla

fiend_o_war.effect_text: while at sea at the start of each of your turns, this card returns to your hand.
fiend_o_war.name: fiend_o_war

fleet_phoenix.effect_text: When played this card gains a permanent x2 for every time a friendly Fleet Phoenix has been destroyed this game. When destroyed, return to the top of your deck.
fleet_phoenix.name: fleet_phoenix

flintlock_fury.effect_text: when played if your opponent has more pirates at sea than you, you may destroy one enemy pirate.
flintlock_fury.name: flintlock_fury

flotsamstein.effect_text: when played, you may send up to two pirates from your poop deck to your davy jones’ locker. this card’s points equal the total of those two.
flotsamstein.name: flotsamstein

forgotten_fleet.effect_text: when played this ship starts exhausted. this card starts in your ship graveyard. when any of your ships are destroyed, you may immediately have this ship set sail and board a pirate on it without costing an order. when sunk, remove from game.
forgotten_fleet.name: forgotten_fleet

gladiator_gold.effect_text: Boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. When played set this pirate’s firepower to exactly the number you need to become equal to your opponent’s firepower.
gladiator_gold.name: gladiator_gold

goldfish_gallion.effect_text: this ship starts exhausted. unless t’s the first player turn of the game, when this ship is revealed, gain a bonus_order.
goldfish_gallion.name: goldfish_gallion

gunpowder_sage_blast_mode.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 3 orders. however, if you have a friendly “gunpowder sage” at sea, you may shuffle it back into your poop deck  and board this in its place without costing an order.
gunpowder_sage_blast_mode.name: gunpowder_sage_blast_mode

gunpowder_shackles.effect_text: equip to one of your pirates. if this card is destroyed, you pick two of your opponent’s pirates at sea to destroy.
gunpowder_shackles.name: gunpowder_shackles

hacker_of_halyard_rig.effect_text: while at sea if you start your turn without a hidden shanty or “equip to” shanty attached to this card, it’s destroyed.
hacker_of_halyard_rig.name: hacker_of_halyard_rig

hangkor_lord_of_gallows.effect_text: boarding restriction: can only be played if there’s only one booty left. this card’s firepower is equal to +99. when destroyed, is instead removed from the game and all friendly pirates at sea are destroyed too.

hangmans_barge.name: hangmans_barge

harbinger_of_pyrocy.effect_text: when played look at the bottom card of your poop deck. if it’s a shanty, this card is immediately destroyed (then shuffle poop deck).
harbinger_of_pyrocy.name: harbinger_of_pyrocy

harbor_harpy.effect_text: when played if your opponent has double, or more, pirates at sea than you, bring one of your opponent’s pirates over to the ship this pirate is on, if able.

haunted_hauler.effect_text: every time a juju (purple) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.
haunted_hauler.name: haunted_hauler

headwind_hero_of_land-ho.effect_text: while at sea this card counts as if all “equip to pirate” shanties at sea and in your davy jones locker have been played on it.

heavy_metal_shanty_rock.effect_text: when played, immediately free play a hidden shanty on this card. this card and the attached shanty are not destroyed at high tide. when the hidden shanty is revealed this card is destroyed.
heavy_metal_shanty_rock.name: heavy_metal_shanty_rock

hercules_hull_beetle.effect_text: while at sea each time you access your poop deck (for anything besides drawing a card) give one friendly pirate a permanent +2.
hercules_hull_beetle.name: hercules_hull_beetle

hermit_crawlers.effect_text: when played play on your opponent's pirates. their effect is still active but their firepower is now this pirate's firepower.

indisputable_ironclad.effect_text: this ship starts exhausted. all pirates on this ship get x2.
indisputable_ironclad.name: indisputable_ironclad

jay_sparrows.effect_text: after drawing your opening hand at the start of the game, bring this card to your hand. after any successful runs of the blockade, bring this card to your hand, from anywhere.

kah_mune_deer.effect_text:
surprise you may free play this card and prevent your opponent from setting sail a ship until their following turn. if there is nowhere to play, this card is instead destroyed.

kannon_katcher.effect_text: while at sea when your opponent sends a volley, you may destroy this pirate instead of the intended target.

kickus_cactus.name: kickus_cactus

kommodore_kong.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are tropical, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

lava_landlubber.effect_text: when played select one ship at sea (friendly or not) and flip it face down. its pirate code and effect are null. for all purposes it’s a normal boom ship.

lava_tug.effect_text: every time a boom (red) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.
lava_tug.name: lava_tug

lightning_eels.name: lightning_eels

lord_voyager.effect_text: While at sea all of the pirates on this ship and the ship opposite now count as no effect pirates (including htose being played).

madame_crossed_bones.effect_text: while at sea once per game turn, if one or more of your pirates (besides this card) is destroyed, gain an extra order on your following turn.

master_sheepwright.effect_text: while at sea count the effect of the ship it’s on as if there’s a second copy of the ship’s effect (as if it just set sail).

monarch_matey.name: monarch_matey

monkey_bones.effect_text: on your turn, if this pirate would complete a crew when played, you may free play it to complete the crew.

monster_musketoon.effect_text: equip to a pirate. that pirate gets x2

mr_manty_and_his_magical_hat.name: mr_manty_and_his_magical_hat

ocean_keep.effect_text: everytime a deep sea (blue) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.

pearl_pieces_of_three.name: pearl_pieces_of_three

peglegasus.effect_text: when played on the following turn, your opponent can’t run the blockade.

pocket_pirate.effect_text: while at sea for every friendly “pocket pirate” at sea, this card gets x3.

pyramid_prow.effect_text: while this ship is at sea, every time you play a shanty (hidden or not) draw a card.

requisite_icebreaker.effect_text: this ship does not need a pirate aboard to run the blockade.

scarpion_treasure_bug.effect_text: when this card is drawn from the top of your deck, you may free play it, if able.

sea_u_gator.name: sea_u_gator

shiver_me_timberers.name: shiver_me_timberers

shogun_scourge.effect_text: while at sea when either player declares they are searching for the treasure, you may free play a card from your hand.
shogun_scourge.name: shogun_scourge

shrimpviathen_aka_jumbo_shrimp.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are deep sea, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

skeletal_sloop.effect_text: once a turn, when a pirate with no effect boards this ship, you may immediately play a shanty/hidden shanty from your davy jones’ locker.

spectral_dutchman.effect_text: this card starts the game in your davy jones’ locker.

spinnaker_spud.effect_text: at the start of each of your turns (after this card is revealed) where there are no pirates aboard this ship, draw an extra card

sponge_barbarian.effect_text: Boarding restriction: you need at least five friendly pirates at sea
sponge_barbarian.name: sponge_barbarian

stinger_class_jelly_frigate.effect_text: when this ship sets sail, your opponent must reveal their hand to you.
stinger_class_jelly_frigate.name: stinger_class_jelly_frigate

subject_s3a_zku11.effect_text: while at sea this pirate gets x2 for every pirate on the ship opposite it.
subject_s3a_zku11.name: subject_s3a_zku11

sunrise_supplies.effect_text: draw back up to having five cards in your hand.
sunrise_supplies.name: sunrise_supplies

sword_bay_salvager.effect_text: when this ship sets sail, your opponent immediately shuffles their hand back into their deck and draws back up to how many cards they had previously.
sword_bay_salvager.name: sword_bay_salvager

teachs_ticking_time_bomb.effect_text: when this card is played, shuffle it into your opponent’s deck. the next time either player draws a “teach’s ticking time bomb” that player’s opponent immediately sinks one of that player’s ships.
teachs_ticking_time_bomb.name: teachs_ticking_time_bomb

terror_of_the_seas_tater.effect_text: when played you may, instead of boarding, attach this card to a pirate friendly or not, like you would a shanty. that pirate's base firepower now becomes +10 ignore this pirate's firepower.
terror_of_the_seas_tater.name: terror_of_the_seas_tater

the_art_of_marooning.effect_text: this card may be free played from you hand when either player successfully runs the blockade. pick one pirate (friendly or not) that would have been destroyed after the blockade run and return it on a new ship on your following turn.
the_art_of_marooning.name: the_art_of_marooning

the_bladeheim.effect_text: when this ship completes a crew, gain one extra order.
the_bladeheim.name: the_bladeheim

the_deckrunner.effect_text: when played if played on an exhausted ship you may free play another pirate. ignore that pirate's effect it now counts as no effect
the_deckrunner.name: the_deckrunner

the_doomtreader.effect_text: if the pirate “doombeard” is aboard this ship, any ship sending a volley at it must have more points aboard than “the doomtreader” has aboard in order to sink it.
the_doomtreader.name: the_doomtreader

the_grand_old_seaworth.effect_text: when your opponent boards a pirate on the ship opposite this one, you may immediately free play a pirate from your hand. then flip this card face down. it now counts as a normal boom ship.
the_grand_old_seaworth.name: the_grand_old_seaworth

the_greater_sand_witch.effect_text: while at sea this pirate gets +2 for every shanty in your davy jones’ locker.
the_greater_sand_witch.name: the_greater_sand_witch

the_icemoor.effect_text: while at sea your opponent additionally needs more pirates than you to run the blockade.
the_icemoor.name: the_icemoor

the_legendary_flamighydra.effect_text: while at sea this card gets +5 for every ship in your ship graveyard.
the_legendary_flamighydra.name: the_legendary_flamighydra

the_legendary_octdent.effect_text: equip to a pirate. it gets +8
the_legendary_octdent.name: the_legendary_octdent

the_mapillion_vi.effect_text: anytime you start your player turn and this ship has a complete crew, gain a bonus order that turn.
the_mapillion_vi.name: the_mapillion_vi

the_plankwalker.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are juju, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.
the_plankwalker.name: the_plankwalker

the_seastress.effect_text: when played pick one pirate at sea (friendly or not). that pirate permanently loses their effect and this card gains it (activate this effect as if this was just played).
the_seastress.name: the_seastress

the_ship_rex.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are boom, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.
the_ship_rex.name: the_ship_rex

the_squall_skiff_squad.effect_text: this ship starts exhausted. when this ship is played, you may immediately board a pirate on it (without costing an order).
the_squall_skiff_squad.name: the_squall_skiff_squad

the_sunken_crown.effect_text: when played and after each order, this card equips itself to the pirate at sea with the highest firepower (if able). it remains where it is on a tie. after it’s played, each subsequent time it equips to a new pirate, the player whose pirate it is gets a bonus order. this card is only destroyed after a successful run of the blockade.
the_sunken_crown.name: the_sunken_crown

the_vacation_demon.effect_text: when played both players shuffle their hands back into their poop decks and draw that many cards.
the_vacation_demon.name: the_vacation_demon

topgallant_knight.effect_text: while at sea all pirates on the ship this pirate is on cannot be destroyed, moved or returned to your hand directly by card effects.
topgallant_knight.name: topgallant_knight

toucan_trader.effect_text: when played you may either immediately draw two cards or search your poop deck for a pirate and bring it to your hand.
toucan_trader.name: toucan_trader

treasuratops.effect_text: when played draw a card and draw 1 additional card at the start of each of your turns.
treasuratops.name: treasuratops

tree_house_hullentine.effect_text: once a turn, when a pirate with no effect boards this ship, gain an extra order.
tree_house_hullentine.name: tree_house_hullentine

tricorn_of_dawn.effect_text: cannot be played as a hidden shanty. when this card is played, swap one friendly pirate at sea with one of your opponent’s pirates (no boarding effects activate).
tricorn_of_dawn.name: tricorn_of_dawn

truest_aim.effect_text: cannot be played as a hidden shanty. destroy one pirate at sea.
truest_aim.name: truest_aim

unkillable_kiwi_krew.effect_text: while in your davy jones’ locker, if you retrieve any card from your djl, you may also free play this card.
unkillable_kiwi_krew.name: unkillable_kiwi_krew

urchin_virus_ultra.effect_text: equip to a ship. all of your opponent’s pirates with firepower over +4 now get brought down to +4 (after any effects are factored in).
urchin_virus_ultra.name: urchin_virus_ultra

wave_in_a_bottle.effect_text: when played exhaust one of your opponent’s ships.
wave_in_a_bottle.name: wave_in_a_bottle

weredolphin.effect_text: when played if this was played in any way besides a direct order, it gains +26.
weredolphin.name: weredolphin

ye_olde_ferry_fox.effect_text: when one of your pirates is destroyed, you may bring it to your hand and immediately board this card onto a friendly ship.
ye_olde_ferry_fox.name: ye_olde_ferry_fox

zombuoy.effect_text: when destroyed, during your next turn, board this pirate on a friendly ship.
zombuoy.name: zombuoy
